name: 氣候變遷
description: 使學生了解氣候變遷背後的科學立論。介紹人類系統與自然系統如何產生互動暨互動後對人類生存環境的衝擊。
goals: 了解觀測的氣候變異與變遷原因
認知氣候變遷為一門不確定科學的本質
體會人類活動為地球氣候系統的一部份
syllabus:
01 : Earth climate system; Ch.1-2 of SGP  
02: Observed climate variability and change (I); Ch.3 of SGP  
02 : Observed climate variability and change (II); Ch.4 of SGP  
03 : Observed climate variability and change (III); Ch.5 of SGP  
04 : The carbon cycle and atmospheric carbon dioxide; Ch.6 of SGP  
05 : The carbon cycle and atmospheric carbon dioxide (cont.)  
XX : Mid-term exam.  
06 : Greenhouse gases and greenhouse effects; Ch.7 of SGP  
07: Direct and indirect effects of aerosols; Ch.8 of SGP  
08 : Radiative forcing of climate change; Ch.9 of SGP (TBA)  
09 : Atmospheric processes and feedbacks; Ch.10 of SGP  
10 : Oceanic processes and feedbacks; Ch.11 of SGP  
11 : Projections of future climate change; Ch.12 of SGP  
12 : Projections of future climate change (cont.); Ch.13 of SGP  
XX : Final exam.

methodologies.note: 介紹觀測氣候變遷及未來推估
研讀重要文獻、進行討論、分組報告
